item.description:
Finding the Love You Want
The Cure for Being Single...When Nothing Else Has Worked


Has your love life been...

  • A series of unsatisfying relationships with the wrong people?
  • Sabotaging yourself when dating or in a relationship?
  • The frustration and loneliness of the endless search for love?



What if there is something holding you back that you don’t know about?


The truth is...
Most people aren’t aware of their own blocks to finding love.


What if you could discover the fears, insecurities, and
limiting beliefs that keep you from your special love ~
and had a breakthrough way to eliminate them quickly
and easily?

At this workshop you will:

  • Learn why you may be attracted to the wrong people
  • Discover your internal obstacles to finding healthy love
  • Quickly clear your obstacles using the Emotional Freedom Technique
  • Use the Law of Attraction to bring your special love into your life



Date: Saturday, April 18th
Cost: $118 ($98 if payment received by April 9th)

For more information and to register:
Finding the Love You Want Workshop

PS. There is a 6 week teleclass version of this workshop starting on Monday, March 30th:
Finding the Love You Want Teleclass

group.name: The Western Mass Singles Meetup Group

item.name: Workshop: Finding the Love You Want - A Breakthrough Approach
